title: Cannot add existing gmail account
content: Cannot add an existing gmail account to thunderbird (1:102.7.1+build2-0ubuntu0.22.04.1) even though I have two others that were created without a problem. I examined the differences in the configuration of the TB account data and It is identical to the other two gmail accounts except name, login, and the assignment of a trash folder. I selected Advanced settings and forced the addition of the account to TB yet was unable to create folders such as Trash as TB said they already exist even though they are not shown. The only folder shown in the forced account is Inbox. I included window snapshots for each step. I don't understand why the michiaito8@gmail.com account is not being added. The account works at mail.google.com via browser and on my iPhone. Please advise. Thanks.
creator: joehodge3rd

title: Thunderbird - Descarga de correos por POP al crear una cuenta
content:
Buenos días,

Normalmente tengo que ir instalando cuentas que ya existen en diferentes equipos. Estas cuentas, tienen un volumen importante de mensajes en el servidor puesto que se deja copia por seguridad y luego se van borrando cada x tiempo (6 meses generalmente).

El tema es que cada vez que instalo la cuenta en algún equipo, me comienza a descargar los mensajes de los 6 meses y ésto implica una importante cantidad de tiempo y espacio en los equipos.

¿Hay alguna opción donde se puede configurar que la descarga de correos se realice sólo a partir del día actual o de un día concreto?.

PD. Se trabaja por POP y se quiere seguir así, además, la cuenta está instalada en bastantes equipos.

Gracias por su ayuda, un saludo
creator: javierirun1

title: opening links in emails

title: New mail won't download
content:
Hi,

I need help to solve this issue that's been occurring for months already, and which has forced me to start using my other e-mail accounts.

New mail is coming in -- I can see it in my Inbox when clicking "Read new messages". However, when I try to open each mail individually, they won't download/open, and all I see is a white background.

Al I can see from new mail (in the Inbox) is the sender, the subject, and the date and time it has been received, but it seems the content is not downloading or something.

What can be causing this?

Thanks in advance!

Laura

creator: martin334

title: Encoding changes suddenly, UTF-8, unreadable emails
content:
Why I post this issue: I've read many threads about similar issues, but most are about issues occuring when replying, or seem older, or suggested solutions that didn't work for me.

Issue description: On Thunderbird 102.7.2, (64 bits) on Windows 11, I have this recurring problem: Some emails that I can read perfectly for quite some time, suddenly becomes "encoded" wrong (gibberish characters). It might happen after moving them into subfolders, but I'm not sure, since it only happen on a few rare emails (that happen to be important). Example : "d=C3=A9marrer la th=C3=A8se le 1er D=C3=A9cembre". This looks like UTF-8. It also adds random quotations where there should be none.

Attempts to resolve so far: - I have excuded C:\Users\me\AppData\Roaming\Thunderbird from Windows defender, as it was suggested somewhere an antivirus could be the issue, but the issue happened again. - The "Charset menu" addon was suggested, but UTF-8 is already selected, and I cannot select another charset. - "Repair encoding" produces no effect. - Moving back the email to another folder also has no effect.
creator: nil.tshuapcya

title: Connection to Server Has Timed Out--For Incoming Mail
content: Intermittent problem, but ongoing for at least three weeks now! Ugh! New email messages will not load, churns for a short while, then error message pops up: Connection to the Server advtrain.com has timed out. SiteGround hosts my email account. Running Windows 11 on a Surface laptop. Have not had a ThunderBird problem for years and years--until now! So frustrating.... As for others here in the past, outgoing usually works, but also gives message that mail has been sent but could not be copied to Sent folder. I now BCC myself...and often forget. All my mail from my server gets to my iPhone just fine. At first thought it was a timing issue, so took TBird out of the startup tray. Then deleted Avast virus detection. Sometimes leaving TBird up and open would get emails after hours-long waiting. Have not gotten any new emails int TBird now for 25 hours! What to do? I've cleared cache, deleted a ton of emails from webmail, changed port settings. I prefer responding to emails on the Surface, rather than on my phone...but they aren't on the laptop for me to respond to. Last Windows Update automatically installed on 2/15/23....hmmm What to do? I need to solve this so I can stop thinking about it! Whew! Thanks for any help and suggestions, Alice
creator: alice.wojcio

title: Gmail - Authentication failure when connecting to server
content:
After reinstalling Thunderbird (102.7.1 (64-bit)) on Linux Mint I have a persistent authentication error with my gmail account, so I cannot send or receive my emails through Thunderbird.

- I am 100% sure of my password and that it has been entered correctly. - I have no antivirus (Linux does not need one). - Thunderbird is set to accept cookies. - OAuth2 is set as authentication method. - Connection security: SSL/TLS. - Servers: imap.gmail.com (port 993), smtp.gmail.com (port 465). - In my Google account settings Thunderbird has access to my account.

Many thanks for any help.
creator: robert.d.hale

title: thunderbird backup file will not open
content: I recently started having issues with my computer hard drive so I created a backup in Thunderbird. I reloaded a new hard drive in my computer and I cannot import my profile. Thunderbird tells me the folder is invalid. Windows tells me the folder is empty if I try to extract the files. I tried manually copying the contents of the profile folder and that didnt work either. I connected my old hard drive as a flash drive and I cannot find my emails there either. Please help.

title: Delivery Status Notification (Failure)
content: For many Years I have been using Thunderbird to send e-Mails to Family Members. Recently, I have been receiving Delivery Status Notifications saying: "The following message to <nona563@gmail.com> was undeliverable. The reason for the problem: 5.3.0 - Other mail system problem 550-'5.7.26 This message does not pass authentication checks (SPF and DKIM both 5.7.26 do not pass). SPF check for [airgale.com.au] does not pass with ip: 5.7.26 [203.59.1.89].To best protect our users from spam, the message has 5.7.26 been blocked. Please visit 5.7.26 https://support.google.com/mail/answer/81126#authentication for more 5.7.26 information. r20-20020aa79634000000b0059242a657d9si16409528pfg.140 - gsmtp' " I normally send to 2 People as a Group e-Mail; but even when I send to them singly, still get the same Messages. Nothing has changed within my System; and I also recently received a similar Message when sending to another long Term Contact; as well as a recent Contact at the Legacy Beta Testing Facility. Is this a Problem with gmail?
creator: howdee

title: Duplicate Folders & e-Mails

How can I resolve this Problem. I have been using Thunderbird for many Years and am a consummate Hoarder, so almost everything is saved. Am I collecting too much Data in Thunderbird?
